  • Classes in goal.core.kr.language used by goal.core.kr 
    Class and Description
    CompiledQuery
    Represents an expression that can be queried on a database.
    DatabaseFormula
    Represents an expression that may be inserted into a Database object.
    Query
    Represents an expression that can be queried on a database.
    Substitution
    A substitution is a mapping of distinct variables to terms.
    Term
    Interface to represent terms that may occur in queries, action parameters, etc.
    Update
    Represents an expression that can be used to update a database.
